item.description:
We meet for a potluck lunch from 11:30 - 12:30 and then have our presenter present from 12:30 - 1:30 pm.

Best Practices For Your Practice
with Cynthia Pasciuto

A best practice is a process that a business uses to effectively deliver a service or product to the public, consumer, or other business. It is efficient because there is a pattern that will be followed so that a good experience is produced. It is used in education, insurance and nursing, to name a few industries, but the idea can be applied to any business no matter the size. The benefits of having Best Practices can be used in marketing to show consistency , plus you will gain word of mouth clients because of your standards. You are also setting a legal benchmark for your business, because of this you want to make sure that you can meet your best practices. Learn how to create and implement Best Practices in regards to marketing and the law.

Cynthia Pasciuto, and attorney and insurance broker saw a need within the health and wellness community and created TrueNorth Business Consulting in Arlington, MA (truenorthbusinessconsulting.com). They were experts in their service, but struggled with management, legal, insurance and marketing. She created the TrueNorth Guidebook for Health & Wellness Practitioners. She provides one on one consulting, in addition to seminars. Cynthia is on the faculty of the National Whole Health Institute and has an online class with the American Massage Therapy Association. Cynthia is also an adjunct professor at Bentley University where she has introduced a new program with the State Office of Minority and Women Business Assistance.

RSVP with what you'll bring to the potluck lunch.

$10 meetup fee
item.name: October Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
